requirements.summary: Build the Home hero section with the provided headline/subheadline, CTA buttons to Courses/Articles, and a dark tech background with subtle animated code-line accents.

Create global styles/Tailwind layers for the dark tech theme and add reusable animation keyframes/classes to support the hero’s subtle code-line accent effects.

requirements.summary: Implement the Contact page with an inquiry form, visible support email, social links, and accessible client-side validation with a clear success state.

requirements.summary: Implement the Certificate Verification page UI with a certificate code input, backend verification call, and clear Valid/Invalid result states.

User can input a certificate code and submit
UI displays a deterministic result for known sample certificate codes and an Invalid result for unknown codes
Backend exposes a query-style method to verify a certificate code without requiring authentication

file_operations.description: Implement the certificate verification form (certificate ID/code input + submit). Use the existing actor via the existing hook to call the backend verifyCertificate capability and render clear result states (Valid/Invalid), including loading and error handling for the call. Use shadcn-ui input/button components by composing from frontend/src/components/ui (do not edit them). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add small UI helper utilities (e.g., input normalization and deterministic mapping for known sample codes in the UI copy/help text) to support consistent verification UX while relying on the backend for actual validity.
